title: PBE long delay
body: I've been waiting for 2+ years to get approved in PBE, is it normal, is it only me, what's wrong?

replies.body: The application can certain be a long process, but it doesn't mean there's something necessarily wrong with your application.  As long as you have an account in good standing, you're eligible for acceptance.  I don't have further information to share beyond our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) on how to get accepted.  Best of luck!
is it possible to look our "karma" ?
Thank you anyways, I just wanted to know if it was normal to wait for such a long time ?
